exDescription: Foreach iterators allows you to iterate through a list of data, like creatures, messages, effects, projectiles, etc.

name: creature
description: Iterates through creatures in the client, the values are stored in the variable p. Optionally, you can specify kinds of creatures to consider. Possibilities are: p for players, m for monsters, n for NPCs, u for summons, f for creatures on the same floor as you, s for creatures on your screen, t for shootable creatures, r for reachable creatures, x not you. You can group as many categories as you want. For more information about creatures, visit this
ex:
local lowestHealth
foreach creature m 'ms' do
	if not lowestHealth or m.hppc < lowestHealth.hppc do
		lowestHealth = m
	end
end

print('Monster with lowest health: '.. m.name ..', ID: '.. m.id ..', HPPC: '.. m.hppc)
exDescription: Will iterate through all the monsters ('m') on your screen ('s'). For each monster, it will check if its health is lower than the health of the monster store in the variable lowestHealth. In the end it will print the name of the monster with the lowest health.

name: newmessage
description: Iterates through messages received in game, the values are stored in the variable m. For more information about messages, visit this
ex:
auto(200)
foreach newmessage m do
	if m.sender == 'Bubble' and m.content == 'sio me' then
		cast('exura sio "Bubble')
	end
end
exDescription: Will cast 'heal friend' on Bubble if she asks for it.

name: newprojectile
description: Iterates through projectiles shot in game, the values are stored in the variable p. For more information about a projectile, visit this.
ex:
auto(200)
foreach newprojectile p do
	if p.type == 32 and p.tox == $posx and p.toy == $posy then
		playsound('playerattacking.wav')
	end
end
exDescription: Will play an alert if someone shot a missile of the same type as the 'sudden death rune' at you.

name: neweffect
description: Iterates through effects in game, the values are stored in the variable e. For more information about an effect, visit this.
ex:
auto(200)
foreach neweffect e do
	if e.type == 13 and e.posx == $attacked.posx and e.posy == $attacked.posy then
		playsound('monster.wav')
	end
end
exDescription: Will play an alarm if a 'healing effect' happened at the same position as the creature you are currently attacking.

name: newanimatedtext
description: Iterates through animated texts in game, the values are stored in the variable t. For more information about animated texts, visit this.
ex:
init start
	local totalExp
init end
auto(200)
listas('Total Exp: ' .. totalExp)
foreach newanimatedtext t do
	if t.type == 215 and t.posx == $posx and t.posy == $posy then
		totalExp = totalExp + tonumber(t.content)
	end
end
exDescription: Will show the sum of experience animated texts that appears on the top of your character.

name: navchar
description: Iterates through the navigation players that the bot currently has information about, the values are stored in the variable p. For more information about nav players visit, visit this.
ex:
foreach navchar p do
	print(p.name, p.team)
end
exDescription: Will print the name and the team of all the navigation players the bot has information about.

name: navping
description: Iterates through navigation pings, the values are stored in the variable p. Navigation pings are sent using the command navsendping, for more information about it, visit this.

name: queuedevent
description: Iterates through all the events in the bot's queue, the value is stored as a table in the variable m.

name: deathtimer
description: Iterates through the death timers inside the bot, the value is stored in the variable d. Death timers stores the time when the bot saw a player dying, so you can know how long it will take for your PZ locked to go out. For more information, visit this.

name: supplyitem
description: Iterates through the supply items at the currently selected supply profile, the value is stored in the variable m. For more information about supply items visit this.

name: lootingitem
description: Iterates through the loot items at the currently selected looting profile, the value is stored in the variable m. For more information about looting items visit this.

name: vipentry
description: Iterates through all the vip entries in your VIP list, the value is stored in the variable v. For more information about vip entries visit this.
